mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.username, C.nickname from diaryDB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favDB GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userDB C ON A.iuser = C.iuser ORDER BY B.favCnt DESC

select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.username, C.nickname from diaryDB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favDB GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userDB C ON A.iuser = C.iuser ORDER BY A.iboard desc
